kpi.name: M5012C0

kpi_info.title: MAXIMUM USED SUBUNITS FOR R99 IN FSM
kpi_info.use: "The maximum usage of subunits for R99 CEs in the FSM, obtained by sampling with a predefined sampling period during the measurement period. The counter includes: - CE resources used for DCHs. - CEs used for CCCHs. CCCHs don't utilize R99 CEs if BTS includes Flexi Rel3 HW."

kpi.kpi_alias: MAXIMUM USED SUBUNITS FOR R99 IN FSM
